name: Thea 2: The Shattering
description: In the dark lands inspired by Slavic myth, life is a struggle for survival against ever increasing odds, be it natural or malevolent. Can you lead your flock to prosperity in this innovative blend of 4X strategy, RPG and card game?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit Processor: Dual Core 2.2 GHz or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 class GPU with 2GB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Device Additional Notes: Internet Access recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit Processor: Quad Core 3.5 GHz or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 class GPU with 4GB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Device Additional Notes: Internet Access recommended
